Eager to make Honolulu better? Volunteer alongside me:  
## [Interest Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1pKPYfx2gh-hBR9zLa-RYNE5nTR674k5_0pkEFngt4vA/edit)  
  
I direct small teams tackling real policy challenges. Past volunteers report improving their knowledge of government, civic skills, and professional connections.  
  
Excellent volunteers often become mentees, whom I help to select and secure long-term, high-impact roles in government or community service.
